segments.text: I ’ m betting the New York Yankees win . How about you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I ’ m favor of the Red Sox . They ’ Ve had a good season .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sorry , guys . Could I just interrupt for a moment ? My money is on the Yankees !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That ’ s not a very good pick . I ’ m against the Yankees .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hey , Ken . Good luck if you already put your money on the Red Sox .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , I ’ m with you on that .
segments.speaker: S2
